snippet.title: Bethesda Plays Fallout 4 - Vault-Tec Workshop (Developer Walkthrough)
snippet.description:
Get a first look at Fallout 4's upcoming add-on. Vault-Tec Workshop, coming to Xbox One, PlayStation 4, & PC on Tuesday, July 26!

Lead Artist Ryan Sears & Lead Developer Kurt Kuhlmann give an inside look how you can take command of Vault 88 and build your very own vault.

Follow our channel on https://www.twitch.tv/bethesda and never miss when we go live!

To learn more about Fallout 4, visit Bethesda.net or visit these Fallout sites

Official Website
http://fallout4.com

Facebook
https://facebook.com/fallout

Twitter
http://www.twitter.com/fallout

Instagram
https://www.instagram.com/fallout/

Tumblr
http://fallout.tumblr.com

ESRB RATING: Mature with Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Strong Language and Use of Drugs.
